qas.question: What is act 21 of 2000 in Namibia?
What does act 21 in Namibia regulate?
In what year was the Federation of Namibia Tourism Associations founded?
In what year was the Hospitality Association of Namibia established?
In what year was the Association of Namibian Travel Agents founded?
In what year was the Tour and Safari Association of Namibia founded?

context: Namibia's primary tourism related governing body, the <a0_0>Namibia Tourism Board<a0_0/> (NTB), was established by an Act of Parliament: the <a1_0><b4_0>Namibia Tourism Board Act<b4_0/>, <b5_0><b6_0><b7_0><b8_0>2000<b8_0/><b7_0/><b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> (Act 21 of 2000). Its primary objectives are to regulate the <a2_0>tourism industry<a2_0/> and to market Namibia as a tourist destination. There are also a number of trade associations that represent the tourism sector in Namibia, such as the Federation of Namibia Tourism Associations (the umbrella body for all <a3_0>tourism<a3_0/> associations in Namibia), the Hospitality Association of Namibia, the Association of Namibian Travel Agents, Car Rental Association of Namibia and the Tour and Safari Association of Namibia.
